text: Ovey, holy cow, oh my God, WOW!! lol yeah its a conversation starter. It sparkle no mater where you are, it's light in weight, & the presentation for this watch was beautiful. Enjoy the pics

text: I took this watch to an official michael kors store in New York to get fitted as it was too large. They told me it was fake.
name: Juan

text: This is a Authentic watch, you don't have to worry about buying a fake watch. Went to a Jewlery Store and they charged me only 5 Dollars to resize the watch and it fits realy nice.
name: Johnny

text: Love this watch. Style and color is perfect. Very pleased.
name: James Milton

text: Its really good watch. worth buying in this price. Though its color seems little light as compare to photo shown. but over all I will recommend to buy it
name: Jimmy

text: Watch is absolutely beautiful. Great price for the money. All functions work. I had to take off 3 links to fit me but that was very easy to go to a jewelry store and do it.
name: Dr Michael Luchen

text: I bought this watch for my husband for his birthday. The watch came in a white Michael Kors box not the brown one. A manual was not included only a small cardboard with 'watch care instructions.'
name: Selena Gomez

text: Watch Was Initially Purchased For Casual Use/Wear. Have Owned Watch For Over A Year And So Far Has Served Its Purpose.
name: Kapitan
